title: Can anyone help me
body: Well I was playing a game only to finish to 'your summoner has been banned' , so I was wondering how do I find out why I was banned so I can improve myself and if it is a reason I did not do how could I speak to riot about having it lifted

replies.body:
Send a support ticket in
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

stating why did you get banned. Also, when you get banned, there should be a reason why you got banned sent from riot in client.
Nah they are only doing manual audit bans atm.
